explains: v. <英，非正式>使戏剧演员的演出僵住

sentences.en: Detectives placed the corpse in a body bag.
sentences.cn: 刑警们把尸体装进了一个运尸袋。

sentences.en: He recoiled in horror at the sight of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 他一见到尸体就吓得往后缩了。

sentences.en: The next witness proved the finding of the knife near the corpse.
sentences.cn: 下一个证人证实在尸体附近发现了那把刀。
